wikipedia_page.main: Phil Hill (born 23 May 1982) is a Welsh professional ice hockey player currently playing for the Cardiff Devils of the Elite Ice Hockey League.  He is also a member of the Great Britain national ice hockey team.

response: Phil Hill or Philip Hill or Phillip Hill may refer to:
*Phil Hill (19272008), American racing driver, Formula One champion in 1961
*Phil Hill (ice hockey) (born 1982), Welsh ice hockey player
